question: boil between breast..please help?
question_content:
hello all...
               i am 21.. i need urgent help..i have strange boil between ma breast...they come two and three at a time...and stay for 2-3 weeks...then after they become normal there is still kind of hard thing inside my skin between my breast...the boils secrete puss and some time blood.and cause pressure and pain to area...i am having this for last 3 years...please tell me is it normal or something dangerous..i am so worried have appointment with dr but am afraid to go...help

answers.answer_content: it doesnt sound like anything too bad, just go see a doctor.
